mei siyalu duk rasiyage kelawara kirimak pene nami itha yehekayi (sitha) shrangawen gihigen nikma shasanayehi pawidi wuye weyida‚Äö hethema mese pawidi wuyema labha sathkara kirthi yana meiwa upadawayida‚Äö mbaahu ee labha sathkara kirthiya nisa sathutu weyida‚Äö samipurnawu adahas aththe noweyida‚Äö mbaahu ee labha sathkara ki ‡∑ärathiya nisa thaman usas kota nosithayida‚Äöanun pahath kota nosithayida ,mbaahu ee labha sathkara kirthiyata wada itha usaswuda‚Äö itha pranithawuda yami ee dharmayo wedda‚Äö ee dharmayan athkara ganima pinisa kamaththa upadawayi‚Äöuthsaha karayi‚Äö nopasu batawu pawathumi aththe‚Äö patangath wiyryaya aththe‚Äö sila samapaththiya samipurna karayida‚Äö mbaahu ee sila samapaththiyen sathutu weyida‚Äö samipurnawu adahas aththe noweyida‚Äö mbaahu ee sila samapaththiya nisa thaman usas kota nosithayida‚Äö anun pahath kota nosithayida‚Äö ee sila samapaththiyatada wada itha usas wuda‚Äö itha pranitha wuda‚Äö yami ee dharmayo wedda‚Äö ee dharmayan athkara ganima pinisa kamaththa upadawayi.
